dashboard.title: Your Posts
dashboard.subtitle: Manage and view your created posts
dashboard.noPostsDescription: Start by creating your first viral LinkedIn post with our 7-step workflow.
dashboard.deletePostDescription: This action cannot be undone. The post will be permanently removed.
dashboard.postReadyToPaste: Post ready to paste on LinkedIn.
dashboard.sessionHistoryDescription: All conversation and decisions made during the creation of this post.
dashboard.postsBeforeUpdate: Posts created before this update don't have history.

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Manage your preferences and profile
settings.personalDataDescription: Your personal information for better experience
settings.phoneDescription: With area code, also used for WhatsApp
settings.contentProfileDescription: Configure your profile to generate personalized content
settings.themeDescription: Choose between light and dark mode
settings.dangerZoneWarning: When you delete your account, all your data will be permanently removed. This action cannot be undone.
settings.deleteAccountDescription: Permanently delete your account and all data
settings.deleteAccountWarning: This action is irreversible. All your posts, profile and personal data will be permanently deleted.
settings.deleteConfirmDescription: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action is irreversible and all your posts and data will be permanently removed.

studio.guidedWorkflow: Guided workflow to create viral posts
studio.describeChange: Or describe what you want to change...

studio.foundUnfinishedSession: We found an unfinished creation session

studio.selectFormatThatFits: Select the format that best fits what you want to communicate
studio.helloLetsCreate:
Hello! Let's create a viral LinkedIn post.

To start, select the type of content you want to create:
studio.greatChoiceFreeWrite:
Perfect! You chose to write freely.

Tell me: what topic do you want to write about today?
studio.greatChoiceTemplate: Great choice! Let's create a post about
studio.selectSuggestionOrType: Select one of the suggestions below or type your own topic:
studio.typeYourTopicBelow: Type your topic below to start:
studio.couldNotLoadSuggestions: Could not load suggestions. Type your own topic below to continue:
studio.greatNowTellObjective: Great choice! Now tell me: what is the objective of this post? Who is the audience you want to reach?
studio.whatFeelingToAwaken: Perfect! Finally, what feeling do you want to awaken in the reader?
studio.excellentBriefingComplete:
Excellent! I have all the briefing information.

Now choose the copywriting structure that best fits your objective:
studio.greatChoiceSelectContentType: Great choice! Now select the content type:
studio.hereAre3Hooks: Here are 3 hook options for your post. Choose the one that best matches your voice:
studio.hereIsTheBody: Here is the body of your post:
studio.nowLetsCTA: Now let's move to the CTA. Generating options...
studio.chooseCTAToFinish: Choose the CTA (Call-to-Action) to finish your post:
studio.excellentScoreAchieved: Excellent! Your post achieved a score of

studio.almostThere: Almost there! Improve the items in yellow above.
studio.postsNeedScore8: Posts need a score of 8+ to maximize chances of going viral.

profileStudio.title: Profile Studio
profileStudio.subtitle: Configure how your posts will sound
profileStudio.completeProfile: Complete your profile for personalized posts
profileStudio.welcomeDescription: Here you'll configure how you want your posts to sound. Answer honestly. The more specific you are, the better your posts will be.
profileStudio.fineTuning: Fine-tuning of your tone of voice
profileStudio.archetypeDescription: How do you want to be seen on LinkedIn?
profileStudio.antiValuesDescription: What ANNOYS you in content creators?
profileStudio.goldenRulesDescription: Is there a RULE you never break when creating content?
profileStudio.goldenRulesPlaceholder: E.g.: I never ask people to follow. I just deliver value.
profileStudio.discDescription: Identifies if you are Dominant, Influential, Stable or Conscientious.
profileStudio.bigFiveDescription: Measures Openness, Conscientiousness, Extraversion, Agreeableness and Neuroticism.
profileStudio.settingsSaved: Your settings were saved. Your posts will now sound exactly like you.
profileStudio.reviewAndFinalize: Review and finalize your creator profile.
profileStudio.testsDescription: These tests capture nuances of your personality that further refine how your posts sound. Choose the ones you want. The more you complete, the better the results.

analytics.title: Analytics
analytics.subtitle: Track your posts performance
analytics.noDataDescription: Create posts to see your performance metrics here.

landing.heroDescription2: 7-step workflow with AI that guarantees score 9+/10.
landing.howItWorksDescription: A guided 7-step workflow that transforms any professional into a viral LinkedIn content creator.
landing.workflowDescription: From briefing to finished post in 15 minutes. Choose structure, content type, hook and CTA with smart suggestions.
landing.aiClaudeDescription: Content generation with Anthropic's most advanced model. Hooks, body and CTAs created specifically for your profile.
landing.scoreDescription: Scoring system based on real data. Posts with score below 9 are automatically improved.
landing.dataAnalysis: Analysis of 318,842 LinkedIn posts (Q2-Q3 2025) to understand what really works.
landing.singlePlan: A single plan with everything you need to create viral content.
landing.joinThousands: Join thousands of professionals already using AI to dominate LinkedIn.

goals.leadsDescription: Attract potential customers for your business
goals.authorityDescription: Position yourself as an expert in your field
